text: Valentina Tăzlăuanu (5 January 1950 – 3 June 2020) was a Moldovan essayist, journalist and theatre critic. She was the editor in chief of Sud-Est. She was Chief of Arts Department at Literatura şi Arta magazine from 1977 to 1990. She also was Deputy Minister of Culture from 1997 to 2000. She was also a member of the Moldovan Writers' Union as well as member and Secretary of PEN Club Moldova. Tăzlăuanu died on 3 June 2020 in Chișinău, Moldova at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Moldovan writers Category:Essayists Category:Journalists Category:Civil servants Category:Theatre critics
title: Valentina Tăzlăuanu
